document_data.name: Ascot Stumblefoot
document_data.mainbody: '''Ascot Stumblefoot''' was a [[halfling]] shopkeeper inhabiting the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
He owned [[the Spice of Life]], a well-stocked [[spice]] and [[herb]] shop located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] near the [[River Trail Gate]]. He imported spices from all across [[Toril]] including [[Kozakura]], the [[Moonshae Isles]], [[Maztica]], and [[Zakhara]].

He initially decided to settle in the area because of its close proximity to his favorite vintage of [[wine]] and [[tobacco]]. Ascot sacrificed much during the destruction of Zhentil Keep in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, by cutting down to just three meals a day.
